message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a valuable asset that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth $10000 to you. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $9500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to ensure you receive the best deal possible. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
